tool.name: SeedListGenerator
tool.description: Generates seed lists for feature detection.
tool.command:
SeedListGenerator
#if $param_in: -in $param_in #end if
#if $rep_param_out: -out #for token in $rep_param_out: #if " " in str(token): "$token.param_out" #else $token.param_out #end if #end for #end if #if $param_use_peptide_mass: -use_peptide_mass #end if #if $adv_opts.adv_opts_selector=='advanced': #if $adv_opts.param_force: -force #end if #end if

param.name: param_use_peptide_mass
param.label: [idXML input only] Use the monoisotopic mass of the best peptide hit for the m/z position (default: use precursor m/z)

tool.help:
Generates seed lists for feature detection.
For more information, visit https://abibuilder.informatik.uni-tuebingen.de/archive/openms/Documentation/release/2.3.0/html/TOPP_SeedListGenerator.html
